title: 28-3; Are Patriots legit? Devonta Smith; WWE BIG E; What's happening with the Jets?
itunes:title: 28-3; Are Patriots legit? Devonta Smith; WWE BIG E; What's happening with the Jets?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Shaun O'Hara and Nate Boyer explore where this New England Patriots team stacks up against the rest of the AFC East; then they get into the best matchups to look forward to in week-11 which includes a Patrick Mahomes and Dak Prescott discussion; they also play mixed bag trivia and the theme this week is the 'Greatest NFL Comebacks' to commemorate the 28-3 legacy; then they're joined by Devonta Smith who touches on his relationship with Jalen Suggs and his head coach Nick Siriannni; and lastly, they're joined by WWE Superstar BIG E who shares why he loved watching Derrick Brooks growing up and gives an all-time hype speech to the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
